message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with its value to me.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I can't go below $9,000 for this product.  I believe it's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am unable to meet your price. I am willing to pay up to $8,800 for the product. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise.
